items.title: Trump sanctions International Criminal Court, calls it 'illegitimate'
items.description: The Hague-based body has created a "shameful moral equivalency" between Hamas and Israel, the White House says.

items.title: Argentina canal turns bright red, alarming residents
items.description: Pictures and videos show the intensely coloured water flowing into an estuary, the Rio de la Plata.

items.title: Oscar-nominated West Bank feature director says films 'can be part of change'
items.description: The film by a Israeli-Palestinian group follows the fight over home demolitions by the Israeli army.

items.title: Judge halts Trump's government worker buyout plan
items.description: The offer is part of an ongoing effort by the Trump administration to slash the size of the federal government.

items.title: Why Trump is on the warpath in Somalia
items.description: Militants in the mountains of north-eastern Somalia have become the beating heart of Islamic State in Africa.
